name: Razor's Fury
description:
Razor's Fury is a platformer game where you play as a werewolf collecting emblems of the dark and defeating enemies through an obstacle course by hopping between different dimensions.

This 3 stage game was made over a 4 week period for a school project under UOW Malaysia KDU University College.

How To Win

Reach the flag at the end of each stage with the highest score possible before the timer runs out! To earn scores:

  • Collect all emblems
  • Defeat all enemies
  • Don't take any damage
  • Finish the game quickly

For each achievement stated above fulfilled, you will be rewarded a badge!  Additionally, you will be awarded a badge based on your performance - from copper, silver to gold and even platinum!

Don't let the timer of your HP run out! Otherwise, you'll restart from the first level!

Credits

This game is created using Stencyl. All design, art and programming are done by me. 

Click here to access the audio credits for the game.
